about_the_game:
Does stock trading scare you? Try the Stock Exchange Game!

You will learn how to make money of financial quotes by playing it!

It is not just some simple stock exchange game simulator — you’ll be immersed in the real trading game!

The Stock Exchange Game is the only virtual trading game in the world, based on thousands of world events: analyze the financial news and its impact on quotes.

You won’t just guess when the price will fluctuate — you’ll know it precisely!

Millions of complex combinations make this game, where every step is unique.
Buy and sell on the world’s virtual stock market game. Earn your first billion and reinvest it.

Try yourself in the role of a real trader!
Competent investments are guaranteed to pay off. Stock Exchange Game has a unique management and level up system, which allows you to effectively use your knowledge and skills.

This is the traging game where you develop your knowledge based on real stock exchange experience. Here you can train your intelligence, memory and analytical processes. You will want to become a real trader with this trading game!

This business and investing game will help you face stock trading without fear, learn about finances and investments, and prepare for real trading!

Stock Exchange Game – to the moon!

“A speculator is a man who observes the future before it occurs.” – Bernard Baruch.
detailed_description:
Does stock trading scare you? Try the Stock Exchange Game!

You will learn how to make money of financial quotes by playing it!

It is not just some simple stock exchange game simulator — you’ll be immersed in the real trading game!

The Stock Exchange Game is the only virtual trading game in the world, based on thousands of world events: analyze the financial news and its impact on quotes.

You won’t just guess when the price will fluctuate — you’ll know it precisely!

Millions of complex combinations make this game, where every step is unique.
Buy and sell on the world’s virtual stock market game. Earn your first billion and reinvest it.

Try yourself in the role of a real trader!
Competent investments are guaranteed to pay off. Stock Exchange Game has a unique management and level up system, which allows you to effectively use your knowledge and skills.

This is the traging game where you develop your knowledge based on real stock exchange experience. Here you can train your intelligence, memory and analytical processes. You will want to become a real trader with this trading game!

This business and investing game will help you face stock trading without fear, learn about finances and investments, and prepare for real trading!

Stock Exchange Game – to the moon!

“A speculator is a man who observes the future before it occurs.” – Bernard Baruch.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or equivalent
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu or equivalent
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12.0
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 14.0
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Stock Exchange Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Stock market game with trading on the commodity exchange for beginner traders
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Croatian, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Hausa, Hebrew, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, Kazakh, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Mongolian, Persian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Uzbek, Welsh, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
